description:
While Luffy continues his battle with Blueno, Soge King`s giant companions make their presence felt, and the assassins of CP9 experiment with Devil Fruits!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Stop! Hoist the Counterattack Signal!
Ne vous arrêtez pas ! Le signal de la contre-attaque est donné !
Tachidomaru na! Hangeki no Noroshi o Agero!
立ち止まるな! 反撃の狼煙を上げろ!
